Cindy, Would you please take a look at the problem?

fixes have been checked in to the head of CVS. A Monitor.Analysis.LogImport_Windows_Event_Logs_Vista needs to be run on vista two machines, or on one vista machine,start the RAC on that machine, change the remote host value to "127.0.0.1" at the datapool.
